channel.description: Recent content in show on Open Component Model

item.title: tags
item.description: Usage ocm show tags [<options>] <component> {<version pattern>} Options -h, --help help for tags -l, --latest show only latest tags --repo string repository name or spec -o, --semantic show semantic tags -s, --semver show only semver compliant tags Description Match tags of an artifact against some patterns.

item.title: versions
item.description: Usage ocm show versions [<options>] <component> {<version pattern>} Options -h, --help help for versions -l, --latest show only latest version --repo string repository name or spec -s, --semantic show semantic version Description Match versions of a component against some patterns.
